title: I am 16 years old. Which skill should I develope during quarantine period? - Quora

response.answer_text: What do you think you enjoy the most? Let it be dancing, singing, martial arts, drawing, sketching, painting, learn a new language, reading or anything else that excites you. And if you are not sure then try different things with materials already avaiable at home & productive use youtube. Cultivate the skill that you find most fulfilling! Hope this helps.
